So visit the temporary website at 
www.asighofthetimes.comand let me here from ya.Larry R.

story:
Your money means so much to us. The moment we receive it, we recommence working with even more zest and intensity.  Where there is money, there is the messenger!

  • 200 new avatars (superheroes, of course)
  • 400 stories for these avatars
  • New scenarios for in-app games
  • Improved VoIP quality
  • Updated algorithms of image selection matching the message 
  • Customizing laboratory for superheroes

  • Animated background of a text message
  • More than 10 in-app games
  • HD Selfie Camera
  • many many more 

We created a great many different perks matching all possible tastes and desires of our users because we really genuinely appreciate your support. With the help of our perks you can be among the first who get the superheroic messenger and learn what it feels like to be a superhero ($11 and more package). With the $35 and more package you can look like a superhero. If you would like to feel like the “chosen one”, you can buy an unlimited version of the messenger which is $101 and more package. That is not all! This is only the beginning! 

It is very important to be a fan of what you do, to understand and value other people’s likings! That’s what we really practice. We created unique perks with exclusive bonuses for true comics fans. With these perks, you can create your own avatars ($5000 and more package), buy the VIP account with your personal fan club ($10000 package), or create a superhero yourself according to your prototype ($25000 package). So feel free to position yourself like a superhero with your own fan club for millions of messenger users. Who knows, perhaps you will turn into a legend and will be the part of comics universe like Superman or Batman. 

We treat every participant of the campaign like a new family member. And family members take care of each other. We are not only grateful to you for your support and help. We are also concerned about your life improvement. That is why we prepared FrameStore for you. It you are good at making images, you can easily create your own superheroes and images with them here to later sell them out. 

The real gem is two super perks where we offer you to be our shareholders. Have you ever dreamt about being a billionaire and drinking coffee together with Zuckerberg and Koum? It becomes possible with our comics project.  You will be able to buy whatever you want with the couple of billion left on your account. 


If money isn’t what you can donate, or if you already purchased some perks, but you still want to continue supporting us in every possible way, then help us make HeroApp messenger project famous all over the world (at least on the Internet). We are open for communication, we seek your attention and contribution, so we are waiting for you to subscribe in social networks. Whichever social network you use, be it Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumbrl, Pinterest, VK, we are easy to reach.

And don’t forget to “Like” or share whatever we do or post, no matter whether you actually like it or not. :) Click “Like” buttons anyway! And you will feel the superpower deep inside. Following us, help us spread the word. Repost our stuff. Or post your own. We’ll share stuff you can post, and if you make your own cool stuff, let us know and we’ll share it. Tell your friends about us, and let them tell everyone they know about us also. Repost or create your own posts, do whatever you can to tell as many people about us as possible! Let people get excited about our idea. Let their eyes burn with desire to help. Let them turn into more HeroApp fans. Then make them come to this page and give, even if it’s just $2. We need you to help us commit a heroic deed and found the most impressive Crowdfunding company the world has seen. We can do it together!                         


Hello everybody! 

My name is Mark Berger, and we are Digital Dogma studio (www.ddogma.com). 
Everything started in a toyshop, when I decided to try an Iron Man mask on. At that moment, I realized that there was a place for a superhero in every adult man’s heart! Unfortunately, I am not a film star and my name is not Robert Downey Jr., so there is nothing I can do to star as the Iron Man in the next series of this fantastic action film. Then I thought, why not create a messenger, where people could communicate on behalf of their favorite superheroes?

I am a founder and director of the Digital Dogma studio, which I founded in 2010. We had been working in the sphere of mobile apps and Internet web-site production and had gathered a great team composed of highly professional specialists, programmers, designers and illustrators. The next morning I invited the whole team to a conference room for a meeting and told everyone about my idea to create this hero-themed messenger. First, silence reigned in the room. But I saw that their eyes were illuminated with the sparkle of interest and desire to bring this idea to life no matter what. At that very moment I understood that we would get there by all means. 

We started working on this app straight away and things moved fast because we are so passionate about this project. Full of enthusiasm, we made many things in a spontaneous manner, changing the name of the app every other week until we agreed for HeroApp. True, it really sounded more like WhatsApp and this was not accidental. The idea was to create a name which somehow recalled that of WhatsApp, so that people could easily both recognize it and memorize. And, yeah, we wanted to spark interest in our competitors as well. :) 

We have been working on this app for 7 months. Now there is a completely functional prototype ready to be fully tested. We were so deeply involved in the process of the messenger creation that we didn’t even notice how time flew by and morning turned into night, winter turned into spring. We forgot about everything else including other projects, our families, wives, friends and investors! And all of a sudden we realized we had run out of money.

No support from you means no heroic messenger, simple as that. Help us now and we will help you in return. We will make your childhood dream come true and you will learn how it feels to be a superhero! 

We need 500 thousand dollars to finish the messenger and launch it in the AppStore. If we are able to raise this sum of money by September 2015, iPhone and Android device owners will be able to download HepoApp. 


These fortunate souls already got their perks! Hurry up and you will be next.      These wonderful presents are not the only thing you get for helping us. You will become famous all over the world due to the “Wall of fame”. 

It is quite early to say what waits ahead. But we really believe that our project will be a big success, and we see potential for its development for many years forward. It is the lack of funds that currently prevents us from finishing the project. Since we understand crystal clear how much and for what we need money, we also want you to understand why we need millions of dollars and why it is worth giving it to us! Our desire is to be open, transparent and honest with you, thus we are ready to report about every single spent dollar. We represent fanatics and professionals of our work. We neither need Ferraris or yachts. Making our messenger the most powerful one in the world is our only aim! 

Ask your friend.
If he doesn't know, look at the FAQ first
If your question isn't answered here, then ask us. 
If you ask a question, be patient. We’ll respond as soon as we have a free minute.

  • Why aren't you paying for HeroApp Messenger yourselves?
  • When've passed your $500K goal. Why are you still trying to raise more?
  • Is a studio running this Indiegogo campaign with you?

  • Why make a new comic messenger?
  • When will lounch Hero messenger in AppStore? When will it come out?
  • What's Hero messenger going to be about?

  • Coming Soon

  • What if the perk I want is sold out?
  • When will I get my perks?
  • Are all rewards available in all countries?
  • How will you know where to send my perks?
  • What if my address changes?
  • What happens if the messenger never comes out?
  • What if I want more than one of the perks?

  • Coming Soon

story:
EYRIE Magazine #1 Premiere Issue Launch

I'm a well-known Comics & Fantasy artist with decades of experience in creating and self-publishing. There are no Horror magazines currently on the market like the one I'd like to create, which is not just a copy of what's come before but features stories that are timely and relevant today. Launching the first issue successfully will enable us to continue publishing on a bi-monthly basis.

The Print Run

To properly print this B&W magazine we need to purchase a minimum number of copies in advance, for EYRIE it will start at 500 copies. To reach our printing goal, we're offering multiple perks to supporters, like copies "signed in blood" by publisher Von Hoffman, Buttons, Stickers, T-Shirts, Retailer packages and Original Art. If our goal is not reached the print run will be less, resulting in a higher per-copy cost to us.

The Impact

Horror stories have historically followed the fears and concerns of the populace, and these stories are unique in that they reflect many current contemporary social issues, and will continue on this trajectory in future issues also. We believe the Magazine will be successful based on our past publishing experience, the question is simply "how much?"

Risks & Challenges

There are no risks or challenges on producing this first issue, as all the content is ready for publication. 

Other Ways You Can Help

And we always appreciate any kind of support like sharing this project with friends and on social media!  Indiegogo also has great share tools.

story:
Short Summary

Hey guys! my name is Ayo Makinde  and I am the creator of the African fantasy  comic;Njeri-The Telesaic Code, I was born in Ibadan, Oyo  State, South Western region  of Nigeria. Growing  up as a child, my love for fantasy  budded with the phenomenal works  of  C.S. Lewis' Chronicles  of Narnia and the Tolkien fantasy  masterpiece- The Lord of the Rings Triology. The world of covert operation  captured my heart when I started reading the works of the master  of intrigue- Robert Ludlum.  Big thank you to my elder brother  who  introduced me to his  works. Since then I  have  dreamt  of creating  a work that  blended  these two  genres  so perfectly  within the African context. My passion for  comics in general lead me to create the comic brand-comicsDI.

 

THE JOURNEY INTO NJERI

Five  years  ago the journey  into Njeri  started, I spent countless  nights  writing pages upon  pages of the  script while developing  the concept for the character  development at the same  time. In  2016,  I took a giant  step to release a preamble  to the  graphic novel. A  fifteen page colourful comic titled: Njeri  (Illumination). You can  read the preamble  on  my  website- www.comicsdi.com

SYNOPSIS

An  evil personality rises from the sands of history, obsessed with a feat which has, to a large extent, only been achieved by  Alexander the Great  of old,  he seeks to conquer the  known  world using a continent which through the ages has been known as the dark continent as  his sceptre-Africa!.... but why Africa???

In  an alternate realm known  only as  Revotta, a prophecy known as the prophecy of  the 12 thrones has finally been released after thousands  of years. This might be the end of lord bazael, the evil and psychopathic  sorcerer, god of the  Anktalians. The prophecy  is an herald  of  a redemption  long awaited. Forces will  clash, the heavens will bleed, the realms will quake as the  tussle for Revotta thunders.

Caught in  the ticket  of these two realms are two personalities with completely divergent traits: one is a female fast rising Kenyan R&B Singer-Njeri, while the other is the exceptionally brilliant & calculating Hausa born detective-Farouk Garba, a graduate of  criminology  from Arizona State University, U.S.A.

Together, the duo find themselves unexpectedly teaming  up to solve a larger than life puzzle  which might be the  curse of the human  race or  its redemption.

Njeri inspires with deep seated  themes of courage, leadership, scarifice, self-discovery and  redemption.

 

MY MISSION

My  mission in writing  Njeri-The Telesaic  Code is  to  birth a work that  creates  a  perfect blend between  the world  of covert  operation and the enchanted world of fantasy within  the African context. I want to  set  another  record  in  the world of fantasy. 

I started the Indiegogo Campaign because it suddenly dawned on me that   a work  that has  the potential to set another  world record in the fantasy genre  was simply gathering dust and rusting away  on my shelve. I  was robbing  the world of another great work....'cos after  the preamble to the  work, which had  barely scratched  the surface  of the story,  the work dragged  on with endless  delay, part  of the  key  factors  being   inadequate  financial  backing .

So, friends, family, fantasy fans all over the world, I humbly ask for your help in making this dream  come true by guaranteeing  that this  Pan-African Fantasy  tale comes  to  reality. Let's make  history  together.

Thanks for your support!

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

While what is required  to make the  project a  reality is $14,000. However, if we can hit our flexible goal of $15,000, this will enable us begin work on Book Two of Graphic Novel.

WHERE THE MONEY GOES

  •  Indiegogo fees and credit card processing  fees.
  •  Inking, pencilling, colours, lettering and script editing of the written script.
  • Online PR with global reach to push the awareness  of the  project.
  •  A compelling animated  trailer which will be strategically pitched to  drive promotion of the work globally.
  • When the work is completed, the work will be available on  prominent online platforms which include but not limited to Amazon, Kindle, Barnes and Noble.
  •  Hard copy production, distribution and sale will also be explored with a view to making the graphic  novel available in notable  stores worldwide.

 

UNIQUE PERKS AVAILABLE FOR  ALL OUR SUPPORTERS!

  •  $5 donation: Thank you acknowledgement.
  •  $10 donation: Ebook of the graphic novel, which will be sent  to  you before the official release of the work. Hence as a backer, you will  enjoy the privilege of early digital release before anyone  else.

       Also, your name will be among the supporters of the project which will be included in the               work when it is published  globally.

  • $15 donation:  Ebook of the graphic novel, which will be sent to you before the official release of the work.

Also, your name will be among the supporters of the project which will be included in the work when it is published.

Desktop Wallpaper of Njeri, exclusive only to backers  in  this category.

  •   $ 20 donation: In addition to the above, backers in this category will have never before seen concept art(PDF) of the comic  work.
  • $250:  You get a spot to advertise your business on the sponsorship page!
  • $1000 and  more: You will be listed as a producer right under the main credits.

In the alternative that  we  do not reach our target, we will maximize whatever funds we are able to raise from the crowdfunding medium to push the project forward.

 

Risks & Challenges

This  is my first  attempt raising money through a crowdfunding platform and although every possible parameter is taken into account, some issues  might arise that are not  scheduled

I will be  available to answer any question you  might have and I will keep you fully updated as we progress.  I ask for  patience and support.

Other Ways You Can Help

I understand that some people just  can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you  can't help. Here are ways  you  can  be of  support.

  •  Add the  campaign to your favourites.
  •  Use  social  media to help spread: The  Indiegogo  share tools  will be just a click away.
  • The  more comments left on  this  campaign the more  popular it  becomes,  so keep chatting!
  •  If you  have a blog, website or  you feel like writing something about this  page please  do.

Together, the duo find themselves unexpectedly teaming  up to solve a larger than life puzzle  which might be the  curse of the human  race or  its redemption.
Njeri inspires with deep seated  themes of courage, leadership, scarifice, self-discovery and  redemption.
 
MY MISSION
My  mission in writing  Njeri-The Telesaic  Code is  to  birth a work that  creates  a  perfect blend between  the world  of covert  operation and the enchanted world of fantasy within  the African context. I want to  set  another  record  in  the world of fantasy. 
I started the Indiegogo Campaign because it suddenly dawned on me that   a work  that has  the potential to set another  world record in the fantasy genre  was simply gathering dust and rusting away  on my shelve. I  was robbing  the world of another great work....'cos after  the preamble to the  work, which had  barely scratched  the surface  of the story,  the work dragged  on with endless  delay, part  of the  key  factors  being   inadequate  financial  backing .
So, friends, family, fantasy fans all over the world, I humbly ask for your help in making this dream  come true by guaranteeing  that this  Pan-African Fantasy  tale comes  to  reality. Let's make  history  together.
Thanks for your support!

What We Need & What You Get
Break it down for folks in more detail:
While what is required  to make the  project a  reality is $14,000. However, if we can hit our flexible goal of $15,000, this will enable us begin work on Book Two of Graphic Novel.
WHERE THE MONEY GOES

 Indiegogo fees and credit card processing  fees.
 Inking, pencilling, colours, lettering and script editing of the written script.
Online PR with global reach to push the awareness  of the  project.
 A compelling animated  trailer which will be strategically pitched to  drive promotion of the work globally.
When the work is completed, the work will be available on  prominent online platforms which include but not limited to Amazon, Kindle, Barnes and Noble.
 Hard copy production, distribution and sale will also be explored with a view to making the graphic  novel available in notable  stores worldwide.

 
UNIQUE PERKS AVAILABLE FOR  ALL OUR SUPPORTERS!

 $5 donation: Thank you acknowledgement.
 $10 donation: Ebook of the graphic novel, which will be sent  to  you before the official release of the work. Hence as a backer, you will  enjoy the privilege of early digital release before anyone  else.

       Also, your name will be among the supporters of the project which will be included in the               work when it is published  globally.
$15 donation:  Ebook of the graphic novel, which will be sent to you before the official release of the work.
Also, your name will be among the supporters of the project which will be included in the work when it is published.
Desktop Wallpaper of Njeri, exclusive only to backers  in  this category.

  $ 20 donation: In addition to the above, backers in this category will have never before seen concept art(PDF) of the comic  work.
$250:  You get a spot to advertise your business on the sponsorship page!
$1000 and  more: You will be listed as a producer right under the main credits.

In the alternative that  we  do not reach our target, we will maximize whatever funds we are able to raise from the crowdfunding medium to push the project forward.
 
Risks & Challenges
This  is my first  attempt raising money through a crowdfunding platform and although every possible parameter is taken into account, some issues  might arise that are not  scheduled
I will be  available to answer any question you  might have and I will keep you fully updated as we progress.  I ask for  patience and support.

Other Ways You Can Help
I understand that some people just  can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you  can't help. Here are ways  you  can  be of  support.

 Add the  campaign to your favourites.
 Use  social  media to help spread: The  Indiegogo  share tools  will be just a click away.
The  more comments left on  this  campaign the more  popular it  becomes,  so keep chatting!
 If you  have a blog, website or  you feel like writing something about this  page please  do.

story:
Short Summary

I'm a well-known and somewhat notorious Comics & Fantasy Art creator, and if you haven't heard of me I want you to explore this rich & fun visual resource library!  You'll get over 60 digital items for your donation of $100, which is far less than the usual price.  There's no risk and no shipping either, you'll be directed to a private page to make your downloads.  Below are images of all the goodies you'll get!

story:
LIMITED EDITION COVER (INDIE-GOGO ONLY)

 

MINUTES AFTER MIDNIGHT: ISSUE #1 COVER

Story:

After emerging from an underground bunker after a world wide war, fifteen year old Rose stumbles into a war-torn California, where he who has the biggest gun runs the states affairs. With only the sage advice of her care-taker Maggie—who abandons Rose and goes on the run—Rose is left with few clues to find her missing parents who in turn can save this new apocalyptic world. Faced with a dauntingly overwhelming task, Rose sets out, though she has no idea who her parents are or why they’re so important. She doesn’t even know where to look. All she is an old photo that Maggie left her with. Rose finds herself enlisting the help of a merc for hire named Hopper—who may have personal ties to her family. Together the two set on a journey that will change this hellish raider filled world.

 

PAGE #1 Finished

PAGE #1 INKED

 

MEET THE TEAM!

 

www.twitter.com/amazonrozz

 

http://www.davidwentworthart.com/

 

What happens next?

This is where you come in. The Minutes After Midnight comic is nearly complete. Our artist, David Wentworth, and writer Rozzie Sanders are doing an amazing job. This Indie-Gogo campaign is for paying them for their hard work and printing costs. We have chosen to self publish so we would like to get a hard count of comics to order for this first batch without getting too far ahead of ourselves.

 

 

Wallpapers:

story:
Walk Through A Wonderland of Imagination With Us

Johnny Wu (aka @sgtbananas) has turned a passion for toys and photography into an immersive and fantastical adventure that changes dreary reality into a world where all of your childhood fantasies can come true.  Through these images we can visit a world where Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles can fight Storm Troopers and Transformers can walk alongside Spider-Man.  The only limit to what we can encounter is our own imagination.  Johnny's photography provides a window to the wonder we experienced as children when the toys which occupied our worlds weren't just plastic collectibles, but vehicles to unleash the unending imagination of youth.  

Armed with his favorite toys, a passion for photography, and a highspeed camera, Johnny has turned his interest in making life-like scenes with action figures into a brand on Instagram.  Anyone following his @sgtbananas  feed will find the most amazing images turning the mundane into something truly remarkable.  It is the combination of his sense of photography and a vibrant imagination that come together to make his visions a reality.

“I’ve been a toy collector my whole life,” says Johnny Wu. “I’ve always had a strong connection to toys, but it wasn’t until I started taking photos of them that I felt that I was able to share how special they are. Ten Frames Per Second is my lifelong love of toys and photography coming to life. I never stopped being a kid, and I hope that my photos reach the inner kid in all of us.” 

With your help here, we are putting together an exclusive edition hard cover art book featuring some of Johnny's amazing toy photography called 10 Frames Per Second: An Articulated Adventure.  This book is an amazing 224 page tome that gives us a peek directly into our collective childhood with johnny's incredible vision for his toys.  Using full size common place locations and props, Johnny has blended the real and surreal into a vibrant representation of imagination.  It is easy to look at these photographs and get lost in the content to the point that you don't realize they are just toys. 

There's such a genuine playfulness in every photograph that captures the whimsy we used to feel as kids.  Johnny's photography takes you out of the humdrum of your daily life and reminds you what it is like to see things through the eyes of a child.  Remember back to when you would play with action figures and anything was possible.  Chewbacca could ride a skateboard and Mario could jump on the backs of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.  These are the things that Johnny captures with amazing clarity and simple joy.

We are asking Johnny's fans and anyone who remembers what it was like to see toys through the eyes of a child to please consider supporting this project.  The 10 Frames Per Second: An Articulated Adventure Art Book is a fantastic journey into the imagination that we know will resonate with you.  The chapters are full of heartfelt and imaginative photography that will make you smile.  Seeing these toys posed and shot with the juxtaposition of real and full size backgrounds makes the imagination come alive and you can't help get caught up in the emotion they elicit.  Johnny delivers insights on the photos and sets he uses to bring you into the actual photo shoot and allow you to understand the how and why behind the props being used.  

This is the first collection of Johnny's work and will take you on a visual tour of pop culture toys.  The tableaus created are refreshing, inspiring, and energetic.  With each page you will marvel at the breadth of figures and imagination being presented for us to collectively enjoy.  This book is a source of joy that can be pulled off your bookshelf and shared with anyone to spark conversation and nostalgia.  

10 Frames Per Second; An Articulated Adventure is currently being worked on by Johnny Wu.  He has shifted through thousands of photographs to find his favorites that represent a wide range of classic toys.  We're hoping that all of Johnny's fans who follow him on Instagram at @Sgtbananas will take this opportunity to be a part of bringing those beautiful images to a new audience.  We are dedicated to making this a one-of-a-kind book that will be a go-to reference for starting conversations and sharing a little piece of childhood with friends.     

To thank you for helping us, we've put together some exciting pledge levels and cool stretch goals.

Stretch Goals:

IndieGoGo Stretch Goal #1 - $5,000  To be announced after reaching the $1000 funding level

Rewards:

Pledge $5 or more - Thanks for Playing Our Game 

As a special thank you for helping us to launch Johnny Wu's 10 Frames per Second, An Articulated Adventure fundraiser we're giving you the sugar. With this pledge level you get a free Ash Vs The Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf.

Pledge $25 or more - Freeze-Frame! 

Johnny Wu's incredible toy photography comes to life with a full digital pdf of the 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure art book!  This is the full amazing digital volume packed with one-of-a-kind toy photography that turns a plastic figure into a living breathing work of imagination. The hundreds of amazing images will create a unique look at toys and their power and will be the gem of your art book collection.

INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf

Note - Final digital cover may vary.

Pledge $50 or more - 10 Frames Exclusive Hardcover 

At this level you get the incredible exclusive fundraising hardcover edition of 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure art book!  This is a beautiful exclusive limited edition of Johnny Wu's immersive photography that will turn simple action figures into cinematic imagery.  All the imagination of childhood is captured here as the toys are presented in a way that breathes life into their forms and leaves you remembering what it was like to see the potential of fantasy.  The 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Exclusive Hardcover Art Book will be deliver a vision that will amaze your friends and family at the power of imagination.  

 INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Digital pdf

Pledge $95 or more - Signed 10 Frames Exclusive Hardcover

Photographer Johnny Wu adds his autograph to this rare edition of the 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure fundraiser hardcover art book! You can have the very rare signature of the artist himself, Johnny Wu aka @Sgtbananas, on your extremely limited and exclusive edition of 10 Frames Per Second. Johnny signs very few items and this one-of-a-kind edition will be extremely rare and limited to the people that purchase it on the fund raising effort.

 INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Digital pdf

Pledge $150 or more - Digital Art Books Library  

At this level we add a plethora of six of the best digital art books from comics including The Art of Alex Ross, Art of Red Sonja, Art of Dejah Thoris & Worlds of Mars, Art of Vampirella Dynamite Years, Art of Vampirella Warren Covers, and Masters of Spanish Comic Book Art ($275 value).  That brings this pledge level up to a stunning $390 total value!

INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Digital pdf 10 Frames per Second Hardcover Signed

Pledge $250 or more - Print Art Books Library  

Fill your library with six of the best hardcover print art books from comics including The Art of Alex Ross, Art of Red Sonja, Art of Dejah Thoris & Worlds of Mars, Art of Vampirella Dynamite Years, Art of Vampirella Warren Covers, and Masters of Spanish Comic Book Art ($275 value).  That brings this pledge level up to an incredible $665 total value!

INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf,10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Digital pdf, 10 Frames per Second Exclusive Hardcover Signed, Digital Art Book Library


 

Pledge $1,500 or more - Your  Favorite Toy in a Johnny Wu Photo Shoot  

Love your toys? This is a one of a kind opportunity for you to have Johnny Wu photograph your favorite toy in an exclusive photo shoot! This opportunity has never been offered before and may never be offered again. Working in conjunction with the Kickstarter for 10 Frames Per Second, Johnny will supply his unique vision for bringing toys to life with a set of vibrant exclusive digital pictures of your selected toy. Note - photography will be done on a coordinated basis and the timetable will be worked out directly upon completion of the program. A waiver is required allowing the use of the toy and shipping/insurance for the toy must be coordinated.

INCLUDES: Free Army of Darkness #1 digital pdf 10 Frames Per Second, An Articulated Adventure Digital pdf 10 Frames per Second Exclusive Hardcover Signed Digital Art Book Library Print Art Book Library

A Special Sneak Peek

We didn't want everyone to take our word for it, so here is an awesome sneak peek at some of the wonderful imagery of 10 Frames Per Second;  Enjoy!

Dynamite Entertainment would like to thank everyone for considering supporting Johnny Wu's 10 Frames Per Second: An Articulated Adventure Art Book on IndieGoGo!

We are working very hard with some really fantastic contributors to get these heartfelt and imaginative photos together into a unique hardcover presentation. Everyone from the writers to the editors to the designers are passionate about Johnny's work as @Sgtbananas on these beautiful photos. Our plan to bring this wonderful collection of images right out of our collective childhood imagination to life in a book that will spark conversation and nostalgia for the fanciful look at so many wonderful toys. If we are funded, we will be able to move this project to press in the immediate future and deliver this one-of-a-kind tribute to all of Johnny's fans.

We are aiming to have the book printed and shipping to customers by December and in your hands immediately following. With your help spreading the word on Facebook, Twitter, and your favorite social media outlets we can make this special book a reality.

Please visit us at Dynamite.com and @dynamite on Twitter for updates and the latest on 10 Frames Per Second!

And check out Johnny's incredible toy photography at @sgtbananas on Instagram!

story:
Read Ch 1 for FREE | Click Here

WHAT IS THE ELEMENTAL BALANCE?

The Elemental Balance is a story about 4 individuals from around the world who gain the powers of the Elements. They are known as the Elementals. They don’t know how or why they got these powers, but they all died from a natural disaster caused by the Element's energy they harness.

The story follows their journey of finding one another in hopes of unraveling the truth behind their powers and its connection to their resurrection. Instead, they discover that they're being hunted by a mysterious force!

 

The story has been written by Zain Shenwari with artwork done by Luke Horsman

We need your support to COMPLETE the series

So...What's the Story Like? If you enjoy Sci-Fi mystery with twists in every corner then you'll definitely enjoy The Elemental Balance. The story was inspired by shows like "Heroes" & "Sense8" and has been compared to cartoons from the 80's such as Captain Planet or X-Men

ELEMENTAL BALANCE CH 4 | FIRED UP

They say LOVE is like FIRE because when you're in love the heart ignites. But when the heart breaks, it burns! 

Chapter 4 of the Elemental Balance takes place in Chile, South America. A country known for its volcanoes, surrounded by the ring of fire.  A suitable birthplace for the Fire Elemental.

Adriana and Lucia have best friends since childhood but are polar opposites from one another. Adriana prides herself in being good, while Lucia is a troublemaker. Growing up, their parents nicked name them "Angelita y Diablita" or translated in English as "little Angel & little Devil".

After one of them goes through a heartbreak , the other helps by suggesting going on a hiking trip up a volcano.

What could possibly go wrong?

Discover the secrets revealed at the pinnacle of theVolcano in Chapter 4, Fired Up.

Below are the items listed under the "Perks"

 

Paper Action Figures

 

Digital Comics

 

Physical Comics

 

Signature (Signed Comics | Add-On)

 

Book Marks

 

Wristbands

Metal Pins

Necklace (From the comic book)

Fire Elemental Button

Stickers

 

Mini Posters (7" x 10.5")

...And more ITEMS to come...

 

CRITIC REVIEWS: 

CJPendragon from "But Why Tho?".  Click here for the full review.

"The Elemental Balance is a weirdly awesome mash-up of science, superpowers, and humanity that will leave most readers vying for more. It’s well-written, with just enough suspense to have a thrill for your experience."

Steven Leitman from "Reading with a Flight Ring". Click here for the full review.

Part of the joy of reviewing books is when people send me their books and I have no idea who they are or what they do. It is that surprise moment when you feel like you’ve discovered something fantastic. This is the kind of book I tell you about and seek folks this out at conventions.

Mike from "Chico Comics Page". Click here for the full review.

"In comics there are indie publishers, and then there are indie publishers. There was confidence in the writing, the art, and overall design of the book. The art in here is fantastic. Everything feels like a comic I should be reading off the stands." 

Trever from "Frags and Beer". Click here for the full review.

"I enjoyed every panel of this book, and hope to see a lot more from Luke. The pages have a lot of movement and detail. The characters look great against wonderful backgrounds. The pencils are up there with the best that I’ve seen from any company, large or indie. This book is definitely worth checking out." 

ABOUT ME: 

Hi, my name is Zain and I’m the writer for The Elemental Balance. I’ve always had a passion for writing stories. In fact, my first story “Game Plan” was written to impress my wife. Spoiler alert, it paid off! I find it rewarding to bring entertainment to people, that’s my niche! My style of storytelling is grounded in reality but, nonetheless, is fiction. Characters are set in unrealistic situations but have very relatable emotions. Imagine if someone could achieve greatness with a determined will, how would they react if they had powers? This is what my stories are rooted in….emotions! 

ABOUT THE ARTIST:

Luke Horsman is an extremely talented artist from the UK. He is well versed in many forms of art mediums. In fact, Luke did the pencils, ink, and coloring for the first three chapters. His artwork has truly brought the characters from the script to life. 

It's been a blast working with him. We mesh really well. I'm particular with scenes and visual symbolism and he's keen on creating eye-catching, bold illustrations. Together we made an excellent team!  

Check out Luke's website for awesome artwork by clicking here.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Sometimes budgets are tight, and we understand if you can't contribute.  But you still can help us out tremendously if you get the word out.

The easiest way to do that is by using the Indiegogo share tools. 

Contact Us

Need some help? We're always happy to answer any questions. You can contact us through Indiegogo or send us an email at inzanecomics@gmail.com.  Or you can visit us on our website www.inzanecomics.com.

Or...Visit our Social Media sites: 

We here at inZane Comics would like to thank you for your support and hope to bring you amazing comics for years to come!

story_txt: Read Ch 1 for FREE | Click HereWHAT IS THE ELEMENTAL BALANCE?The Elemental Balance is a story about 4 individuals from around the world who gain the powers of the Elements. They are known as the Elementals. They don’t know how or why they got these powers, but they all died from a natural disaster caused by the Element's energy they harness.The story follows their journey of finding one another in hopes of unraveling the truth behind their powers and its connection to their resurrection. Instead, they discover that they're being hunted by a mysterious force! The story has been written by Zain Shenwari with artwork done by Luke HorsmanWe need your support to COMPLETE the seriesSo...What's the Story Like? If you enjoy Sci-Fi mystery with twists in every corner then you'll definitely enjoy The Elemental Balance. The story was inspired by shows like "Heroes" & "Sense8" and has been compared to cartoons from the 80's such as Captain Planet or X-MenELEMENTAL BALANCE CH 4 | FIRED UPThey say LOVE is like FIRE because when you're in love the heart ignites. But when the heart breaks, it burns! Chapter 4 of the Elemental Balance takes place in Chile, South America. A country known for its volcanoes, surrounded by the ring of fire.  A suitable birthplace for the Fire Elemental.Adriana and Lucia have best friends since childhood but are polar opposites from one another. Adriana prides herself in being good, while Lucia is a troublemaker. Growing up, their parents nicked name them "Angelita y Diablita" or translated in English as "little Angel & little Devil".After one of them goes through a heartbreak , the other helps by suggesting going on a hiking trip up a volcano.What could possibly go wrong?Discover the secrets revealed at the pinnacle of theVolcano in Chapter 4, Fired Up.Below are the items listed under the "Perks" Paper Action Figures Digital Comics Physical Comics Signature (Signed Comics | Add-On) Book Marks WristbandsMetal PinsNecklace (From the comic book)Fire Elemental ButtonStickers Mini Posters (7" x 10.5")...And more ITEMS to come... CRITIC REVIEWS: CJPendragon from "But Why Tho?".  Click here for the full review."The Elemental Balance is a weirdly awesome mash-up of science, superpowers, and humanity that will leave most readers vying for more. It’s well-written, with just enough suspense to have a thrill for your experience."Steven Leitman from "Reading with a Flight Ring". Click here for the full review.Part of the joy of reviewing books is when people send me their books and I have no idea who they are or what they do. It is that surprise moment when you feel like you’ve discovered something fantastic. This is the kind of book I tell you about and seek folks this out at conventions.Mike from "Chico Comics Page". Click here for the full review."In comics there are indie publishers, and then there are indie publishers. There was confidence in the writing, the art, and overall design of the book. The art in here is fantastic. Everything feels like a comic I should be reading off the stands." Trever from "Frags and Beer". Click here for the full review."I enjoyed every panel of this book, and hope to see a lot more from Luke. The pages have a lot of movement and detail. The characters look great against wonderful backgrounds. The pencils are up there with the best that I’ve seen from any company, large or indie. This book is definitely worth checking out." ABOUT ME: Hi, my name is Zain and I’m the writer for The Elemental Balance. I’ve always had a passion for writing stories. In fact, my first story “Game Plan” was written to impress my wife. Spoiler alert, it paid off! I find it rewarding to bring entertainment to people, that’s my niche! My style of storytelling is grounded in reality but, nonetheless, is fiction. Characters are set in unrealistic situations but have very relatable emotions. Imagine if someone could achieve greatness with a determined will, how would they react if they had powers? This is what my stories are rooted in….emotions! ABOUT THE ARTIST:Luke Horsman is an extremely talented artist from the UK. He is well versed in many forms of art mediums. In fact, Luke did the pencils, ink, and coloring for the first three chapters. His artwork has truly brought the characters from the script to life. It's been a blast working with him. We mesh really well. I'm particular with scenes and visual symbolism and he's keen on creating eye-catching, bold illustrations. Together we made an excellent team!  Check out Luke's website for awesome artwork by clicking here. Other Ways You Can HelpSometimes budgets are tight, and we understand if you can't contribute.  But you still can help us out tremendously if you get the word out.The easiest way to do that is by using the Indiegogo share tools. Contact UsNeed some help? We're always happy to answer any questions. You can contact us through Indiegogo or send us an email at inzanecomics@gmail.com.  Or you can visit us on our website www.inzanecomics.com.Or...Visit our Social Media sites: We here at inZane Comics would like to thank you for your support and hope to bring you amazing comics for years to come! We here at inZane Comics would like to thank you for your support and hope to bring you amazing comics for years to come!

story:
Episode 3 is here!

Just to help me with printing costs etc, I am selling the comic, as well as other fun stuff here. Help me out by buying or donating, and you can help me keep this whole squirrel thing going. Of course there will be more squirrel stuff in future, but I need some help to keep the momentum going.

For any orders with comics I will ship them out as soon as I can so you can get hands on them ASAP.

My printing costs are about £120 but with indiegogo I can only set a minimum of £500. Anything over the £120 though goes towards me putting together the next stage of the squirrel saga. I am thinking of doing some animation next, but I have a number of decisions to make first.

So please donate and share this as much as you can!

Here are some of the things you can get your hands on:

 

Posters

I have done a new one specially...

Sticker Sheet

Slap some squirrels around your neighbourhood.

Greeting Cards

Blank on the inside so you can provide your own wit and charm.

 

And of course...

Comics

 

Find out more and subscribe at:

www.urbansquirrelisthenuts.com

story:
In an attempt to bring back the glory days for the Neon Nation, Shotter Kurotachi, son of a legendary champion, trains to participate in the world's greatest martial arts event: Destination Tournament. Everything changes when a mysterious organization attacks him for unknown reasons.

 

Iridescent is an action packed story about two heirs of rival countries: Shotter Kurotachi son of the Neon Nation champion, and Emaru Diamondhart the missing prince of the Diamond Nation.  We share in their adventures as they uncover the secrets of their world, forge their own destiny, and battle against high social expectations due to their famous, or in some cases, infamous lineages.

As Shotter continues his adventure to represent his home country, the Neon Nation, he makes friends along the way that help shape his path towards becoming a grand champion and eventually something else.

Throughout the story Shotter will encounter enemies opposed to his goals. One person in particular being Emaru, his nemesis. Emaru's constant attempts to usurp Shotter's journey causes a confrontation between the two of them that brings unpredictable and catastrophic consequences. 

 

Here are some pages:

The book will contain 7 chapters (200+ pages) plus bonus content . Additionally we’re including an audio version of each chapter (QR code).

Saymond (Left) and Pedro Blaze (Right) are the creative team behind Iridescent. Two young men from Costa Rica with a passion for storytelling, manga and anime.  They are the founders of Blaze Manga Productions.  You can find them on your local convention as they tour across the country. They're very active on Instagram, Facebook and YouTube. They even have an Etsy store for their art.

The initial goal is $5,000 to produce the FIRST volume of the manga. This will cover all expenses for the book's production, the audio production,  as well as the Kickstarter rewards. This is the bare minimum needed. The first volume of the graphic novel consists of 7 chapters (200+ pgs) plus bonus content. Any additional funds above the initial $5,000 will allow us to expand the Iridescent brand as well as improve the reading experience for future installments (see Stretch Goals below).

story:
HELL & HOLY WATER #1

GUNS, NUNS & DEMONS...OH HELL!

  • 6 ISSUE SERIES ABOUT A BOUNTY HUNTER AND A NUN WHO HUNT DEMONS IN A BATTLE FOR THE SOULS OF MANKIND.
  • Written, Penciled, and Lettered by: Glaister "SILVERBACK" Ormsby.
  • Inked & Colored by: Leigh Walls.
  • Creative Consultant: Devante Sanchez.
  • This campaign is to fund the printing and unveiling of Issue no. 1 of my comic series "HELL & HOLY WATER".
  • Contributions will go towards the funding of a lifetime dream to put out my own comic book under my company SILVERBACK Comics.

What is Hell & Holy Water?

What makes this comic so unique?

  • It's an epic tale where there are "ABSOLUTELY NO POWERS!" That's right our protagonist Jason (The Bounty Hunter) has no special abilities just 2 fists, 10 knuckles and a whole lot of bullets to go along with a nasty ass temperament.  Now his unlikely partner Bella (The Nun) is a whole different kind of nun who kicks ass then prays for forgiveness. Her weapon of choice... Holy water bullets!
  • The duo face corruption in the church, Demons. and each other as they put their differences in faith and personal beliefs aside to save mankind form total annihilation and assimilation from the underworld.
  • It starts in Hells Gate, Arizona but the reach of evil goes global in the book...

        "GRAB YOUR ROSARY AND YOUR GUNS AND ENJOY THE RIDE INTO DARKNESS...SOMETIMES IT'S HELL TRYING TO GET TO HEAVEN!"

What We Are Asking For & What You Get Back

THE BREAKDOWN:

  • We are looking to raise $2,000.00 in order to cover the printing of our #1 issue and well as prints for the series.
  • To those who contribute we are offering everything from PDF's and Physical copies right down to a recurring role in the story and even the opportunity to design a DEMON for use in a future issue.  Everyone who contributes will be added to our acknowledgement page for without all of you there wouldn't be a "HELL and HOLY WATER"!
  • If the entire goal is not reached the amount that is reached will used to print as many issues as possible.  The dream will not die we will see this endeavor to the end...GIVING UP IS NOT AN OPTION!

The Impact of Hell & Holy Water

The Many Faces of H&HW:

  • This project is multi- faceted:
  • It is an opportunity to work with my 13 year old son Devante, and show him that in life it is OK to dream and to love and live for your passion.
  • "HELL & HOLY WATER" has inspired something in my son that I didn't know was present.  He is more vocal about what goes into this story and his creativity has no boundaries.
  • As a fan of Comics for over 30 years I can now not only share that with my son but i can also let him in on the creative side of it and introduce a new generation to the world of comics.
  • "HELL & HOLY WATER" started out from my love for Johnny Cash and Clint Eastwood Westerns like "2 Mules for Sister Sara".  The dynamic of a bad ass and a nun captured me right off the bat and lead me down the path I am on with my 2 main characters Jason (The Bounty Hunter) and Bella (The Nun).  Their tale much like my journey is both unique and mind blowing.  I want to share "HELL & HOLY WATER"with the masses. and with all of you.  Thank You!

The Risks & Challenges of Hell & Holy Water

  I lose a piece of myself in every page I write but I find it again with every word I read back and every panel that I draw.  Glaister "SILVERBACK" Ormsby

  • The challenges are simple: Stay true to my characters and the world that they inhabit.  Stay true to their personalities and don't waiver for anything.
  • I'm a fighter, a dreamer, a writer, an artist and more importantly a father and that is enough to get me through the hurdles.  When my kid says "Papa Bear I think we should try this!" and "I don't like that color I like that shade instead it makes everything doable and achievable.

Other Ways You Can Help Hell & Holy Water

I understand that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean you can't help "HELL & HOLY WATER" come to life.

  • Let others know about the work that we are doing here at SILVERBACK Comics.
  • visit us at: www.silverback-comics.com
  • www.facebook.com/HELLANDHOLYWATER
  • www.facebook.com/SILVERBACKCOMICS
  • AND PLEASE DON'T FORGET the Indiegogo share tools!

I THANK ALL OF YOU FOR YOUR TIME & YOUR SUPPORT!!

story:
WHITE CRANE – The Legacy of Fang Chi, Vol 2

Hello! 

I'm Zanna, i'm a martial artist, journalist and the writer of the comic book series critics describe as "Like watching a Shaw Brothers' movie", ""Simply stunning", "Reminiscent of Miller-era Daredevil", with a script that is "Bitingly sharp and will appeal to Garth Ennis fans", with "Tarantino-esque dialogue". 

This isn't your ordinary 'kung fu' comic. This is written by someone who has experienced the real deal and has studied these esoteric arts with masters from around the world for over a decade. It tells the true(ish!) story of a young girl in 18th-century China who prays to the spirit of the White Crane to help her take revenge on her enemies – and create one of the world's greatest martial arts in the process – leaving a legacy that may save the world... or destroy it! 

But after finally finding a great art team and publisher (Markosia Enterprises) and funding the 92-page Volume 1 (below) myself, I know from experience that it could take years to get the funds in place to finish the story and complete Volume 2, and I don't want readers to have to wait  to see the epic conclusion. 

And that's why I need your help. 



INSPIRATION

I'm a huge comic book fan and have studied the Chinese internal martial arts for years (you know, the cool ones based on building chi that give you super powers, not the 'hard' muscle-based ones from Shaolin ;-) ) and I wanted to see them represented in comics by someone who knows them first hand. 

And this beautiful revenge fable, which has inspired so many to take up the arts, seemed like the perfect foil to do that (and somewhere along the way it turned into an epic fantasy adventure!). 

You can learn more about the arts and mythos behind the project in the bonus section of my website www.thewhitecranecomic.com (and check out the 6-page opening scene of the first issue too). 

So, I've got the script finished for the second half of the story (almost :-/) and my awesome art team, headed by the spectacular Santiago Espina are ready and raring to go. By backing this campaign you can be one of the first to read the completed story and help bring Fang Chi's epic adventure to life. Buddha's balls, I can't wait! 

Here's the opening scene to Volume 1, so you can get a feel for the project...


What's in it for you!

Every single penny raised will go towards sustaining the energies of the amazing creative team while Volume 2 is being made, including pencils, inks, colours and lettering, as well as helping to cover printing costs – and that's it!

Not only could you be among the very first to read this epic adventure in full, the perks also on offer are:

  • A surprise gift of digitally-delivered artwork with a thank you email for just £1.

  • All the amazing bonus material artwork, including Chinese calligraphy, original character designs, bonus covers and more for just £3 (see below for examples). 
  • Digital copies of both Volumes 1 and 2 as a high-quality PDF for £5 each or £8 for both. (The fastest way to read the whole story!)

  • SIGNED paperback copies of Volume 1 from it's original, self-published print run in both Matte and Gloss to give away (never to be printed again!) for £8/10.
     
  • And of course you will also be able to get your hands on SIGNED shiny new, revised and re-edited, 2016, high-quality versions of both Volumes 1 and 2, printed by Markosia Enterprises for just £12 each.

  • And best of all, when it's ready, you can be the first to read WHITE CRANE – The Legacy of Fang Chi in it's ULTIMATE format – a deluxe hardback, Special Edition copy of the complete graphic novel comprising both Volumes, with ALL the bonus material, SIGNED and with a personalised message for just £25. PLUS, get the digital version as a high-res PDF for FREE!!!
  • Or you can go for THE FULL MONTY for £100 and get all of the above (including everything signed with a personalised message), PLUS get your name in the acknowledgements page of the ULTIMATE hardback collected edition.
Just click your preferred perk on the right to get involved now.

And, just so you know, even if the total goal isn't reached, I won't be stopped! This project will be completed. So if you do pledge money you WILL receive your reward. And anything you can give to get us started will be hugely appreciated.







Why should you help?

You will have directly contributed to representing the rare and wonderful world of the REAL Chinese internal fighting arts into popular entertainment (a rare thing to say the least!), as well as helping to promote a phenomenal female action character. And you know we all love a kick-ass kung fu girl :-). 

And, who knows? Your contribution may be the spark that starts someone on a journey into a larger world of self-discovery through Chinese martial arts and philosophy – that's my hope anyway. That's not to mention the boost you will give to the careers of the brilliant creative team who work tirelessly in an art form that we all need to support if it is to thrive.

I hope I've proved to you that I can complete a project and produce a quality product, as Volume 1 garnered some great reviews and a professional publishing deal, so you believe me when I say I won't let you down – no matter how long it takes, I will get this done. 

With your help, who knows how far we could go?! I hope you will join us and be a part of this exciting journey. 


No cash? No worries!

And if you love the idea but are not in a position to help out financially, please spread the word about the campaign via the usual social media methods. Indiegogo even have handy share tools below to make it easy! And don't forget to follow us on Twitter: @whitecranecomic or @whitecraneGN; FB: facebook/thewhitecranecomic and check out the website at thewhitecranecomic.com. Also see Markosia.com for updates on the release of WHITE CRANE – The Legacy of Fang Chi.

Your contribution may be the spark that starts someone on a journey into a larger world of self-discovery through Chinese martial arts and philosophy – that's my hope anyway. That's not to mention the boost you will give to the careers of the brilliant creative team who work tirelessly in an art form that we all need to support if it is to thrive.
I hope I've proved to you that I can complete a project and produce a quality product, as Volume 1 garnered some great reviews and a professional publishing deal, so you believe me when I say I won't let you down – no matter how long it takes, I will get this done. 
With your help, who knows how far we could go?! I hope you will join us and be a part of this exciting journey. 

  
No cash? No worries!
And if you love the idea but are not in a position to help out financially, please spread the word about the campaign via the usual social media methods. Indiegogo even have handy share tools below to make it easy! And don't forget to follow us on Twitter: @whitecranecomic or @whitecraneGN; FB: facebook/thewhitecranecomic and check out the website at thewhitecranecomic.com. Also see Markosia.com for updates on the release of WHITE CRANE – The Legacy of Fang Chi.

story:
Chango Summary

Chango is a demon sent to Ruben after a played record releases him unto the world. 10 years after, Ruben lives with his misery solemnly, while his Mother feels she is losing her son in the wake of her husband/his father's death.

What she doesn't know is that he is hiding the dark secret, a CURSE, that he sees all the demons of our deepest fears and insecurities made manifest. Now, Ruben has decided to rid himself of the demon Chango that he has lived with for a decade once and for all!!! BUT, there is no way he could have predicted what would happen when he tried. 

  • Mother-son-demon dramedy
  • Both metaphorical and literal interpretable story.
  • 2 part graphic novel. This is the 1st part! 

 

 

What's in it for us and you?

Well.....

  • A DEEPLY personal story based on true stories from the artists. 
  • 2 chapters in 1! (we decided to give you more) 
  • Honest characters in lushly rich Spanish-American venues.
  • A FULL STORY (56 pages over the two parts)!!!!!
  • Full color from Jasen Smith of Spencer and Locke!

 

Risks?

Always.

But the truth is, we have both been comics creators for years and the product has ZERO problem being made from the pen to press. We just need the funds to get it.

REMEMBER...

We are just looking to fund this apex of our personal storytelling.  It is not about getting rich. We want to produce something that will connect with you and bring you some joy and we need YOU to do that.

Other Ways You Can Help

SHARE SHARE SHARE!!!!

We understand some of you want to help but don't have the funds. Just share and be out personal heroes!

story:
Hi Everyone!

I’m Brian Lue Sang. I’m a husband to a beautiful, supportive woman, and a father to three incredible, fun, and lovely little monsters. But, I’m here because of my love to create! For the second time, I’ve made a comic book (yup, bonafide indie comic guy - bags under the eyes and all) and to say that I would appreciate your help making it a reality is a grand understatement! 

Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies is really a collection of stories created to help flesh out this grand, reimagined world. Did I mention that the book is complete? Yup, nothing left to do with this volume other than formatting a few extra pages of character pinups from:

  • Joe Catapano, artist for the upcoming Star Circuit
  • Macy May, artist of Barry The Blob and part of the No, Nothing 'zine
  • Martha Schwartz, creator of Seed Seekers
  • Enzo Garza, creator of Gutt Ghost and Co-owner of Bamf Comics & Coffee
  • Brenon Conn, artist for Parked 

It may go without saying but, this means a lot to me because... this is my own book. My writing, my art, my lettering. But with that, it’s also my weaknesses, my inconsistencies, and my fears (as a writer, artist, and a person). So why do it? Art has long been my “vice”. It’s the thing I need to do to feel calm, or whole, or just get lost in. In doing my own book, I can focus that feeling into something tangible. Something that’s mine. And maybe in that, it can be something shared with you all and hopefully you’ll enjoy reading about this world as much as I enjoy working on it.

Funds raised for this campaign will go directly into printing costs. My goal is to have enough raised to take to various local comic shops, libraries, and conventions. 

So... “What’s the pitch?” You ask?

Well, step right up! We’re getting to that part in 3... 2... 1... 


Rewards Breakdown

While the goal for this campaign is  $500, one of the largest reasons for using Indiegogo is because of their flex goal option! This way, even if I don’t make my goal, I can still fulfill the pledges of backers regardless. Remember: the book is finished! Overall fulfillment is only hampered by printing costs. 

(Side note: If you’re a Central Florida local, you can come to BAMF Comics and Coffee to pick up your pledge reward from me directly and I’ll throw in a cup of their awesome coffee and a hug [who doesn’t like a good hug? Well, maybe you don’t like hugs - so come to BAMF, get your pledge,  hug-free])!

Here’s a simple breakdown of rewards (see prices on the right sidebar):

  • Digital Download (.pdf format) of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 2
  • Digital Download (.pdf format) of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 1 and 2
  • Print Copy of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 2
  • Print Copies of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 1 and 2
  • Print Copy of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 2 + T-shirt (Your choice of print: Karim the Dragon God, or Aroan the Bear God)
  • Print Copies of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 1 and 2 + T-shirt (Your choice of print: Karim the Dragon God, or Aroan the Bear God)
  • Print Copies of Godlore: Whispered Truths & Lost Lullabies Vol. 1 and 2 + T-shirt (Your choice of print: Karim the Dragon God, or Aroan the Bear God) PLUS a custom 5”x7” commission of YOU as an Animal God! **Limited to 5**

**Each pledge reward includes the option to have your name printed in the acknowledgement section of Godlore, Vol 2. Let’s be honest: it’s not possible without you!**

Don’t want a pledge reward but still want to help? Donate!!

Also, in my first campaign, I included “Become a God” as a pledge reward as well. Problem is, maybe people want a commission, but not everyone wants a comic or a T-shirt. If you want a commission from me, specifically while this campaign is live, it will go directly to the goal. Please feel free to contact me directly at brianluesang@me.com and mention this campaign, I’ll add your name to the acknowledgements in Volume 2 as well. 

 

Pricing, Content, and all the In Betweens

This comic book (along with my previous one, and the ones planned) is extremely important to me as I explained before. However, while that may be the case, I also approach the crowdfunding campaigns from the perspective of a potential backer. That’s why this campaign is being launched now, after the book is finished (again, with the exception of the inclusion of pinups), that way there is very little down time from the end of the campaign to pledge fulfillment. 

Godlore: Whispered Truths and Lost Lullabies Vol. 1 was approached the same way. The book was finished first to ensure that wouldn’t be the hurdle in fulfillment. This won’t be any different. 

Additionally, I went into both books with the idea of providing enough content to make the pledge cost worth it as a backer. Here’s how I look at it:

  • Yes, the lowest pledge for a print version is $15 . It’s an indie comic, so that means there’s no large scale distribution and/or sales to help offset the price tag to something typical of the mainstream. Note that domestic U.S. shipping is free for this pledge tier.
  • HOWEVER... it’s 40+ pages of content, which makes it almost twice the size of your standard comic. So now that price tag seems a lot more reasonable, right?
  • The good news is that your pledges will be fostering not just this project, but the indie comic industry on a whole. It’s a small, but defiant and relentless group who do what we do for the love of the medium and the stories we tell. Personally speaking, it will help me offset cost to keep on creating!

Risks & Challenges

Currently, the only risk is not making the campaign goal. However, as previously mentioned, Indiegogo’s flex goal option will allow for limited print cost coverage to fulfill the backers who pledge regardless of hitting goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

Regardless of you backing the campaign or not - spread the word! This book has fantasy, horror, and other comic-y thingies! You’ve got to know someone who may be interested, right? If you’ve made it all the way down to this part of the campaign page it’s safe to say you probably do (or you’ve got a thing for reading things thoroughly). Everything helps, and I fully appreciate it all!

Thanks!

-Brian

story:
You can view the first half of the first chapter online right here:

http://www.arktisltd.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2...

 

Short Summary

Written by Tim Holden and illustrated by Ivan Fanning, Dog Fight is a fascinating insight into twenty serial chapters of untold true stories during the period of World War 2. Beginning on the very first day we are thrown into the action as the fighting, chaos and treachery begins. The story is centered around the 121st Polish Air-force squadron whose numbers are halved during the first seventeen days of the war and we then follow the survivors as they make a great journey that took them onward to France, North Africa and finally Britain to battle the enemy. We take the dog metaphor a step deeper using anthropomorphic dogs as the characters. 

The story delves deep into unheard of and remarkable events that changed nations not only during the war but that still leave their mark on the people to this day. Help us get dog fight off the ground and we will provide enthusiasts with a story that is compelling, engaging and also lovely to look at. We are both avid story tellers and hopefully you will get as lost in these true stories as we have.

What We Need & What You Get

The graphic novel as it stands is complete up to midway of the first chapter.

Here's a link to a download of the first half of Chapter 1: 

http://www.arktisltd.co.uk/index.php/dog-fight-...

The rest of the story is planned and mapped out but we need your help to get the first chapter out there. Our aim with this crowdfunding campaign is to get the 28 page Chapter 1 complete and we would love your support whilst your involvement gets you first access to chapter 1 in either ebook or hardcopy. We will be releasing the story in serial format and we hope that you will be there for the start of it.

Whether we reach our goal or not all supporters will get an ebook copy of Chapter 1 but your support means the story can continue and it is certainly one worth being told. If it goes the distance the rewards will be endless with everything from books to posters, production art and military grade Jackets provided by Arktis that are extremely high quality and tied into the origins of the story itself.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to see the story but can't support us right now you can help by following the story and making sure the word get's out there. Like and share our social media and everyone whether contributors or not can get access right now to the first half of the first chapter for free.

story: Damon and Stevie are two friends that met through a shared love of books and nerd culture. Through a random conversation, we began the foundation of a story that has grown into something that we are truly excited about telling. Please help us get our comic off the ground! Once we are able to fund the first issue, we both plan on working hard to get it into as many publishers hands as possible, so we can find a home with one that has as much faith in our story as we do.

story:
Camouflage:

                                           "Camouflage allows predators to hunt and prey to survive".

             "Camouflage" is a Canadian indie comic about two ECO Warriors, Camo and Raven.                                          Camo the hunter and Raven the shaman with tattoos that come alive.                                                                                          Can they save the earth?                                                                                                                                  Do you want to help save the earth? 

                      Support and Follow Camouflage

Issue # 1

"Magic of the Spirit Bear" is the story of a hunter that becomes one with a spirit bear to combat big business from developing a remote pristine island.    Cam Oshiro (Camo) finds help and support from a First Nation's woman (Raven) who is a Conservation Officer.  With Camo's unique powers to vanish in his surroundings and Raven's remarkable tattoos, the couple starts their adventures as "ECO WARRIORS" .  Their mission is to right environmental wrongs!

 CAMO the Hunter                   Raven the CO

 

OUR TEAM

Doug Stevenson creator/writer/Canada, Cristian Aluas artist/filmmaker/USA and Edgar Arce colorist/artist/Paraguay.  We are an international collaboration.  

 

Why did we create this comic

First, we love comics and stories.  Second, we wanted to share our idea of supernatural heroes battling with "real world villains".  Third, we are concerned about protecting the earth and it's creatures.  We believe featuring environmental issues like the disruption of pristine natural ecosystems, the ivory trade and shark finning, will increase awareness and ultimately create protection for endangered species and areas.  Our hope is that "Camouflage" readers will be entertained and have a thoughtful experience while enjoying our comics.  Read an issue and see if we are right; free downloads at:           

http://camocomic.ca

 

OUR MISSION

As an independent comic DS comics is looking to fundraise $3,700.00 for the publication of issues #4 and # 5.  Once the series is completed it is our vision to market the comics to the general public, environmentally minded people, youth and school boards. We hope to entertain you and increase awareness of environmental issues.  Once DS comics  is profitable, 1/3 of net profits will be donated to the environmental causes that we have written about.  The first donations will go to the Spirit Bear Research Foundation, World Elephant Day and the Shark Trust.   

 

Issue # 2 

Camo and Raven are called to Africa to combat elephant poachers in an attempt to stop the ivory trade.  Raven's remarkable tattoos help them talk with gorillas and meet the matriarch of the elephants "Kokoi".  Camo captures the internet tycoon responsible for world wide ivory sales and brings him to natural justice.  

 

 

 

FUNDING

The campaign targets to fundraise $3,700.00 which will be used entirely for production and publication of issues #4 and #5.  As with any indie project we have been self funded to date.    We have a dynamic product that has been accepted by fans at New York Comic-Con 2018, Comixology, Webtoons and local comic-cons and bookstores in British Columbia, Canada.  

We are excited about our success and hope you will join us.  Donate or be a contributor and get

                              ​"Perks" 

         

Issue # 3                                    

The world's oldest alpha predator "The Shark", cannot compete with the earth's most devastating predator "Man".  Camo and Raven join the fight to stop shark finning by taking on Mr. Yu and a scurvy band of shark finners.  Raven's octopus tattoo comes alive to lead them into the depths below.  

 

This is a comic series with a purpose.  It is entertaining, fun and has a message.  See Camo vanish in his surrounding and watch him become one with the Spirit Bear. See Raven's animal tattoos (the raven, the monkey, the octopus and others) come alive to help on the quest.  Evil villains, Big Crude Oil, Mr. Yu and Buckerberg the internet tycoon are driven by greed and power without regard for the earth and it's creatures.  Travel the planet and see Camo and Raven fight evil and stand up for the environment as ECO Warriors.   

Issue # 4

"The Battle"  

Tradition vs. Change!   A family's battle for what is right.  To be published.  Your support is greatly appreciated.  Pledge now to keep the adventures of "Camouflage" continuing. 

                  "SEAS THE DAY-SAVE THE EARTH"

 

Ways you can help:

- download and share Camouflage series for free at camocomic.ca 

- contribute what you can or find a perk level that appeals to you

- give your opinions and ideas at "Postings and News" at camocomic.ca

Follow:

- Earthwatch Institute - advancing science

- Ocean Wise - to protect and restore the oceans

- PacificWild - protecting the Great Bear Rainforest

- Spirit Bear Research Foundation - a collaboration of First Nations and science

- World Elephant Day - August 12, 2021

- Shark Trust - Adopt a Shark

 

Thank you and please go to:

 

 http://camocomic.ca

Your support of this Indiegogo.com campaign is  greatly appreciated
